home.title: Welcome to the Cornea Web Academy
home.subtitle: Excellence in Corneal Surgery Education
home.description: Join us in advancing corneal surgery through innovative education and live surgical demonstrations

welcome.title: Welcome to the Cornea Web Academy
welcome.description: Educational platform for corneal surgery founded in 2018 by Prof. Massimo Busin, based at the Department of Ophthalmology, Ospedali Privati Forlì, Villa Igea, in Forlì, Italy.

about.intro: The Cornea Web Academy (CWA) is an educational platform for corneal surgery based at the
about.department: Department of Ophthalmology, Ospedali Privati Forlì, Villa Igea
about.surgeryTypes: including DALK, Mushroom Keratoplasty, DSAEK, UT-DSAEK, DMEK, and SALK.

hdStreaming.title: HD Video Streaming
hdStreaming.description: Watch surgeries in high-definition video quality

liveInteraction.title: Live Interaction
liveInteraction.description: Get answers directly from the surgeon

recordings.subtitle: Watch recorded surgical procedures from our expert surgeons

publications.title: Publications
publications.subtitle: Explore the extensive research contributions from Prof. Massimo Busin and colleagues

liveSurgery.title: Live Surgery
liveSurgery.subtitle: Join our interactive live surgical broadcasts and learn from real-time procedures
liveSurgery.introText: offers you the opportunity to enter the surgical theatre of Prof. Massimo Busin and connect directly with his microscope through high-speed HD video streaming (available in English and Italian)

broadcasting.title: Live Surgical Broadcasting
broadcasting.description: In every session all surgical interventions are performed and discussed live. The broadcasting is addressed both to junior surgeons and to more experienced colleagues.

interactive.title: Interactive Participation
interactive.description: Ask questions and receive explanations in real-time directly from the surgeon, or simply observe and listen to the discussion in view-only mode.

specialized.title: Specialized Surgery Topics
specialized.description: Each surgery focuses on specific themes including DALK, DMEK, UT-DSAEK, DSAEK in PK, and DALK in PK, with at least 2 procedures performed and discussed per surgery.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.subtitle: Get in touch with the CWA team for inquiries, support, or collaboration
